pages.text: $(l)No Griefing$()$(br2)Griefing includes looting any sort of player-made structure, either claimed or unclaimed. If there are $(l)non-Lootr$() chests in what appears to be a base, $(n)do not touch them$(). If you are unsure, you can ask.
Griefing includes purposely destroying the world within the build border.$(br2)We want to keep Hexhaven looking nice!$(br2)Learn more about the build border on the next page$()
